mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_NUM, UPLOAD_DATE, MEM_ID, DESC_TITLE, HIT_COUNT FROM ROOM_BOARD B, ROOM_INFO1 I1, ROOM_INFO2 I2 WHERE B.ROOM_NUM = I2.ROOM_NUM AND B.ROOM_NUM = I1.ROOM_NUM

SELECT B.TRADE_STATUS, I1.ROOM_NUM, I1.MEM_ID, B.UPLOAD_DATE, I2.DESC_TITLE, I2.DESC_DETAIL, M.MEM_ID FROM ROOM_BOARD B, MEMBER M, ROOM_INFO1 I1, ROOM_INFO2 I2 WHERE I1.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID AND B.ROOM_NUM = I2.ROOM_NUM AND B.ROOM_NUM = I1.ROOM_NUM
AND I2.DESC_TITLE like %#{DESC_TITLE}%
AND B.ROOM_NUM like %#{ROOM_NUM}%
AND I1.MEM_ID like %#{MEM_ID}%
